headline: Two big reasons to invest in founder-led businesses
summary: US stocks (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) are rebounding from last week's losses and rallying ahead of Tuesday's closing bell. Intrepid Capital Co-Founder and CEO Mark Travis sits down with Josh Lipton to discuss why he prefers to invest in founder-led businesses, noting their ability to conservatively keep their balance sheets in order. One stock that Travis places in this category is SS&C Technologies Holdings (SSNC). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Are Options Traders Betting on a Big Move in Garmin Stock?
summary: Investors need to pay close attention to GRMN stock based on the movements in the options market lately.
